div.p: Seasonal patterns in humans. ( a) Number of suicides in Japan was significantly greater in the spring compared with autumn seasons. ( b) The number of minor assaults in England and Wales significantly increased during the summer compared with winter seasons. ( c) Number of battles in the Northern hemisphere peaked in August and were at a minimum in January; ( d) the inverse pattern occurs in the Southern Hemisphere with peaks of battles occurring Decemberâ€“February; troughs in July. Data from ( a,b) were kindly provided by Daniel Rock; ( c,d) adapted from [ 59]. (Online version in colour.)
